      • initClient

        public static void initClient()
        initializes Sockets, ObjectStreams, fiends and groups

      • sendLoginOrRegisterRequest

        public static void sendLoginOrRegisterRequest​(java.lang.String login,
                                              java.lang.String password,
                                              ClientToServerMessageType type)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        login - nickname
        password - password
        type - LOGIN_REQUEST or REGISTER_REQUEST Sends to server LOGIN_REQUEST or REGISTER_REQUEST(decided by argument) with login and password.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if type is none of above OR login or password contain '#' OR they are shorter than 4 characters

      • receiveLoginAnswer

        public static boolean receiveLoginAnswer()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        starts listener thread
        Returns:
        true if answer is positive, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if received message is not CONFIRM nor REJECT

      • sendMessage

        private static void sendMessage​(ClientToServerMessage message)
        Parameters:
        message - message Sends message to server via ObjectOutputStream

      • addUserToFriends

        public static boolean addUserToFriends​(java.lang.String userToAdd)
        Parameters:
        userToAdd - who we want to be friends with
        Returns:
        true if message is sent checks if we are not adding ourself to friends and if we are not adding user that is out friend already

      • confirmFriendship

        public static void confirmFriendship​(java.lang.String friendToAdd)
        Parameters:
        friendToAdd - whose invitation we accepted Sends message to server that we are now friends with friendToAdd Add friend's nickname to friends ArrayList

      • checkFriendship

        private static boolean checkFriendship​(java.lang.String friendUsername)
        Parameters:
        friendUsername - nickname that we want to check
        Returns:
        true if username in on our fiends ArrayList

      • sendTextMessageToUser

        public static void sendTextMessageToUser​(java.lang.String userToSend,
                                         java.lang.String text)
        Parameters:
        userToSend - to who we want to send the message
        text - what text we want to send Sends to out friend a text message

      • checkMembership

        private static boolean checkMembership​(java.lang.String groupName)
        Parameters:
        groupName - name of group we want to check
        Returns:
        true if we belong to that group Checks if groupName in on our groups ArrayList

      • createGroup

        public static void createGroup​(java.lang.String groupName)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        groupName - name of group we want to create
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if: we are in such group, name contains '#', more than one word, shorter than 3 characters Sends message to server a request to create a group

      • sendTextMessageToGroup

        public static void sendTextMessageToGroup​(java.lang.String groupName,
                                          java.lang.String text)
        Parameters:
        groupName - to which group we want to send the message
        text - what text we want to send checks if we are the member of the given group if yes, we send it if no, we do nothing

      • addUserToGroup

        public static void addUserToGroup​(java.lang.String group,
                                  java.lang.String user)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        group - to which group we want to add a user
        user - nickanme of user we want to add
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if we are not a member of given group or user is not our friend or we want to add ourselfs

        public static void logout()
        Sends LOGOUT_MESSAGE to server
